title: Nanbaka: Shusseki Bangou no Tsuita Baka-tachi!
original_name: ナンバカ 出席番号のついたバカたち!
ending_song: "Nanbaka Datsugoku Riron♪! (ナンバカ脱獄理論 ♪！)" by Juugo (Yuto Uemura), Uno (Tetsuya Kakihara), Rock (Ire Shiozaki), Nico (Daiki Kobayashi), Hajime Sugoroku (Tomokazu Seki)
sinopse: The official website for the Nanbaka television anime announced that the "Nanfes" event in April will screen a previously unreleased anime special.
